short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension to for task manager

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension allows the user to add tasks that need to be completed, the ability to mark completed tasks and delete if needed. Create, manage, and prioritize tasks right from your browser.
